ActionsWithFilesDescription: Badges will notify you about actions such as upload, creation, and changes in files.
DailyFeedDescription: Read news and events from your {{productName}} in a daily digest.
RoomsActivityDescription: Hourly notifications. Stay updated about all activity in your rooms.
LdapEmailTooltip: This user account is loaded from LDAP. The user's email address was not specified, and the current one was generated automatically and cannot be used to send notifications.
SuccessConnected: {{serviceName}} has been successfully connected as a notification channel. You will now receive updates there.
SuccessDisconnected: {{serviceName}} has been successfully disconnected as a notification channel. Notifications will no longer be sent there.
